resources.string: No location sensor hardware available. The app won\'t receive any location updates
Please enable your smartphones location service, to receive location updates.
Location service disabled. The app won\'t receive any location updates
The app requires the location permission to receive location updates. Please click \"OK\", then \"permissions\" and select \"location\" from the permission list.
Location permission denied. The app won\'t receive any location updates
street and house number, city is optional
Search only near the current location
Google maps, Apple maps or OSM url
Could not extract latitude and longitude. The Apple maps Coordinates url format is unknown.
Could not extract latitude and longitude. The Google maps Coordinates url format is unknown.
Could not extract latitude and longitude. The OpenStreetMap Coordinates url format is unknown.
Could not extract latitude and longitude. The OsmAnd Coordinates url format is unknown.
Could not resolve the shortened url.
Could not obtain the coordinates for the entered node id.
Coordinates url format is unknown. Please enter either an OpenStreetMap, a Google maps or an Apple maps coordinates url.
Please enter a name for the route.

The selected GPX file is invalid.
The selected GPX file contains no route points.
The selected GPX file contains multiple routes. That\'s not supported at the moment.
Failed to parse at least one route point.
Failed to create the route from the extracted points.

The poi profile for this shortcut could not be found. Maybe it was removed.
The selected pt provider found no station nearby.
The line arrived at its destination stop.
Alternatively perform a long click to open the context menu.
Screen remains active, while the app is in use.
Disables the auto lock screen feature during navigation.
Shake to refresh "Where am I" Dialog and "Points" Tab.
Some Bluetooth headphones go to sleep after some time of inactivity and their subsequent awakening produces a noticeable delay. Then the start of the next voice announcement may be truncated.
Do you want to proceed with the import?
The map of which country is missing?
Which public transport provider is missing?

A prior request is still running. Please retry later.
The server is busy. Please retry later.
The selected map is either not available on the server or outdated.
The given location lays outside of the selected map.
The selected map does not offer this feature.
Start or destination point is missing.
The distance between start and destination points is too big. Please include at least one via point.
You\'ve excluded too many way classes from routing.
The server can\'t find a route between the given start and destination.
Please create at least one point profile.
The API version of this app is too old for the selected server. Please check for app updates on walkersguide.org or in the Google play store.
The API version of the selected map server is not longer supported by this app.
The server doesn\'t offer any maps.
